CompetencyEvidence.name: Alias
CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: implementation of Microsoft Office Share Point 2007

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Tanima Gupta has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently she is employed as a Business Analyst at Envision HealthCare. Tanima has extensive knowledge of UML/OMT, RUP, SQL, Microsoft Visio, JAD, Microsoft Project, Rational RequisitePro, Rational ClearQuest, Activity Diagrams, SDLC, Rational Rose, Rational ClearCase, Microsoft SQL Server, Software Development Life Cycle, Regression Testing, Quality Assurance, Microsoft SharePoint, Mercury Interactive TestDirector, Microsoft Team Foundation Server, Microsoft Office Share Point 2007, Microsoft FrontPage, Mercury Interactive WinRunner, CMMi - Capability Maturity Model Integration. So far Tanima has not gained any managerial experience.
